MFRC522.AntennaOff|tooltip: Turns off the RFID module antenna
MFRC522.Init|tooltip: Initializes the MFRC522 module, setting up SPI and necessary pins
MFRC522.getID|tooltip: Reads and returns the UID from the RFID tag
MFRC522.read|tooltip: Reads stored data from the RFID tag
MFRC522.write|tooltip: Writes the specified text to the RFID tag
